signIn.title: Brickly
signIn.description: Track your LEGO sets and build your collection piece by piece
signIn.signInError: Failed to sign in. Please check that your Google OAuth credentials are correct and that the redirect URI is configured in Google Cloud Console.

library.title: My Sets
library.emptyDescription: Search and add sets to get started
library.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove "{name}" from your library? This will also delete all inventory and progress data.

setSearch.title: Search Sets
setSearch.placeholder: Search by set number or name...

boundary.title: Something went wrong
boundary.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try refreshing the page.

help.title: Help & Support
help.tip1: Tap the + and - buttons to track found parts
help.tip2: Use filters and sorting to find parts quickly
help.tip3: Toggle 'Hide Completed' to focus on remaining parts
help.tip4: Switch between List, Grid, and Grouped views
help.contactText: Have a question, found a bug, or want to suggest a feature?

syncStatus.offline: Offline - Changes will sync when online
syncStatus.pending: {count} change{count, plural, one {} other {s}} pending sync
syncStatus.syncFailed: Failed to sync {failed} change{failed, plural, one {} other {s}}
